feels.name: Gratitude
feels.quote: I am very grateful to you for loving me, and thinking me worthy to be your wife.

feels.name: Reverence
feels.quote: I admire and honor him more than any man I ever saw.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Perhaps Celia had never turned so pale before.
feels.place: Learning about Dorothea's engagement to Mr. Casaubon

feels.name: Tenderness
feels.quote: Oh, Dodo, I hope you will be happy.
feels.place: Learning about Dorothea's engagement to Mr. Casaubon

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Her fears were the fears of affection.
feels.place: Learning about Dorothea's engagement to Mr. Casaubon

Places.name: Reading_Mr_Casaubon_s_letter
Places.description: Dorothea reads Mr. Casaubon's proposal letter.

Places.name: After_accepting_Mr_Casaubon_s_proposal
Places.description: Dorothea feels very happy after accepting Mr. Casaubon's proposal.

Places.name: Learning_about_Dorothea_s_engagement_to_Mr_Casaubon
Places.description: Celia learns about Dorothea's engagement to Mr. Casaubon.
